name: Circuit Skirmish "The Game"
description:
A 2d platform-shooter, based off the 2012, 2-part, short animation "Circuit Skirmish" by Jim Schwertfeger (Falconer02). These animations can be found here: 
Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2aqLXpVkj 
Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiaqtqYy6v0 .

This project was developed as the capstone of my, Christopher Koenemann's, education at DePaul University. I had a lot of fun developing this project and bringing it from concept to completion. It was cool experience getting the chance to consult with Mr. Schwertfeger during the game development process! 

I hope you enjoy my game, and leave feedback or comments in the section below!
